title: A handful of Democrats could end the shutdown. No one's budging (yet).
shortDescription: If there's a way out of the government shutdown, it has everything to do with Democrats in the United States Senate.

title: Trump settles old scores with Comey, others on hit list. Who's next?
shortDescription: Since returning to office, President Donald Trump has been pursuing adversaries with legal action.

title: Trump says he 'took the freedom of speech away' on flag burning
shortDescription: Trump made the comments during a Wednesday roundtable discussion, referencing his August executive order calling for prosecution of flag burners.

title: Illegal immigration at the border falls dramatically under Trump
shortDescription: Migrant apprehensions by Border Patrol at the U.S.-Mexico border fell to 238,000 from more than 1.5 million.

title: Trump says he may go to Middle East to see through Gaza peace deal
shortDescription: President Trump said he might visit the Middle East this weekend as he looks to finalize a peace deal between Israel and Hamas to end the war in Gaza.

title: Man vandalizes WA Capitol building
shortDescription: An intruder broke into the Washington State Capitol’s Legislative Building, vandalized artifacts and set fire.

title: What has Pope Leo said about Trump? He is outspoken on immigration
shortDescription: Newly elected Pope Leo has been critical of President Donald Trump's immigration tactics. He was supportive of a Texas bishop speaking out about it.

title: Trump suggests jail for Chicago mayor
shortDescription: President Donald Trump suggested Chicago's mayor and the Illinois governor should face jail for "failing to protect ICE."

title: Memphis Democrats get a heated 2026 House primary race
shortDescription: Tennessee state Rep. Justin Pearson will challenge long-time Rep. Steve Cohen in a Democratic House primary set for August of 2026.

title: Trump threatens jail for Pritzker amid National Guard, ICE tension
shortDescription: President Donald Trump called for the arrests of Chicago's mayor and Illinois' governor as the city braced for the arrival of National Guard troops.

title: Trump sends troops near Chicago
shortDescription: National Guard troops have arrived at a training center near Chicago as President Donald Trump considers invoking the Insurrection Act.

title: Daily Briefing: Culture war in the Supreme Court
shortDescription: Supreme Court skeptical of Colorado's ban on conversion therapy. Here is the news to know on Wednesday.

title: ‘It’s not like it snuck up on us’: Tax credit stalemate in shutdown
shortDescription: Stalemate in Congress leaves millions insured by state marketplaces in limbo.

title: Trump-backed candidate wins primary for Tennessee special election
shortDescription: Matt Van Epps won the GOP primary for the Tennessee special election to fill the U.S. House seat left vacant by former Republican Rep. Mark Green.

title: Florida bill would make colleges rename streets after Charlie Kirk
shortDescription: A new bill would make all of Florida's public state universities and colleges rename one roadway on their campuses after Charlie Kirk.

title: Trump vs. Bad Bunny: A history of their beef
shortDescription: Trump said he's "never heard" of reggaeton superstar Bad Bunny. But they have intersected politically and culturally several times over the years.

title: 'Out of line.' Pam Bondi clashes with Senate Dems in testy hearing.
shortDescription: Bondi accused Democrats of "slander" against President Trump. Sen. Dick Durbin complained about her "refusal to answer the most basic questions."
